mosinstall.name: Search Directory
mosinstall.author: Mosets Consulting
mosinstall.license: This software is copyrighted to the author
mosinstall.description: This module will display a search box for Mosets Tree

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: search_current
param.label: Only Search Current Cat.
param.description: Enabling this option will perform the search in the current and all its sub-categories only. Otherwise it will search the entire directory

param.name: width
param.label: Box Width
param.description: Size of the search text box

param.name: text
param.label: Text
param.description: The text that appears in the search text box, if left blank it will load 'search...' from your language file

param.name: advsearch
param.label: Advanced Search
param.description: Display an Advanced Search to allow visitors to use the Advanced Search page
